title: Intergalactic surprise trip
description: Hop on board for a surprise destination!
info: Our super deluxe spaceship will set off for the holiday destionation of your dreams. The journey to your surprise destination will take approximately 10 hours, where you will stay at one of the finest hotels. Departure time: 09.00, return: 09-10-2021, 09.00.
